apiUrl.label: Orca Memory API URL
apiUrl.help: Your Orca Memory API base URL (or use ${ORCA_MEMORY_API_URL})

keyId.label: Key ID
keyId.help: Agent key id issued in the Orca Memory dashboard (or use ${ORCA_MEMORY_KEY_ID})

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.help: Agent API key issued in the Orca Memory dashboard (or use ${ORCA_MEMORY_API_KEY})

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Inject relevant memories before every AI turn

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically store important information after each turn

profileFrequency.label: Profile Injection Frequency
profileFrequency.help: Inject the Memory Current list every N turns (default 1)

captureMode.label: Capture Mode
captureMode.help: 'all' (default) = filter injected context + short text, 'everything' = capture all messages
